ComicInfo.Title: Extreme Prejudice
ComicInfo.Summary: Extreme Prejudice: Martial arts movie star Sonny Ling wakes up in a hospital and discovers that he's been brought back to life after dying. John Lujack assassinates Nikolai Androvich in Rome, only to be assassinated himself moments later. In Israel, a plane is hijacked by Arab terrorists and Israeli special forces operative Hannah Bashevis is sent on board to rescue the hostages. She kills all terrorists except one, who kills her and subsequently escapes with six hostages. John, Nikolai and Hannah are brought back from the dead, and told by the Secretary that they now work for her and the mysterious Board.
